column4: Anyone available to help with devistating system hangs ? I've check through logs, Memtest86, no clie still
are you running the ath5k driver?
Yep! :)  Or lspci -k  (under the wifi card)
negatory
Then the problem (if this ISN'T a kernel panic) is probably hardware.  Try running the computing with various hardware things not connected and see if it freezes.
Things to try harddrive, PCI cards.  You already tried the ram
memtest proved that works
if it were a kernel panic, it would be in kern.log or syslog?
yes, and you'd see a kernel dump on the screen and the keyboard lights would be blinking
It is like christmas time
I have had a few segfaults in the last few days. they just dont report every time
also, there seems to be some other error along the lines of "sp1500 timer in use at address XXX"
segfaults can be caused by lousy programming or lousy ram.  If the ram passed memtest then it is lousy programming.  Perhaps it is a different driver (besides ath5k) that is freezing the system.
none other than flgrx im sure. however the issues are new and that has been working for some time now.
I'm not sure then :)
You can try radeon if you want.
X always comes up properly with the correct layout and settings.
http://paste.ubuntu.com/1215174/
I'm only aware of a problem with ath5k.
But thanks for showing me!
Thanks for you help.
